website_summaries.verdict: An economical choice for Levi lovers with a great fit and mild stretch.
pros: Cut at the waist with extra wiggle room in the thigh
Buyers choose from various colors, distress levels, and washes
cons: Some longtime buyers say the sizing chart has changed

customer_reviews.title: I believe I'll get another
customer_reviews.text: Beware ! 🛑 Not the Levi's of old ! Much thinner and has a lot of stretch . NOW, that being said... I am happy with the purchase. Being that I'm NOT the teen that I used to be, my body type has changed whether I like to admit it or not. These jeans are very comfortable, they don't ride up, they have just the right amount of give in just the right places. I'm actually going to go ahead and order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Runs 1-2 pant sizes too big
customer_reviews.text: Runs WAY too big. I bought these at the same time as a Levi's 711 jean and the waist is at least 3 inches bigger even though they are supposedly the exact same size. Material isn't great and gave me goosebumps touching it, ew. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kate C

customer_reviews.title: Levi Women’s Straight 505 Jeans - Dark Blue
customer_reviews.text: I love these jeans. They are just like the ones I purchased 3 years ago in a brand store. Same fabric content, same fit. These are my favorite Brand and Make. I do have a concern about the appearance of discoloration around the top front, but I don’t wear my shirts tucked in so not a problem for me. It may be something that comes out or evens out after a good wash. I will definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. TH Smith

customer_reviews.title: No more elastic/stretch in all women’s jeans please!!
customer_reviews.text: No. It had elastic/stretch in the fabric. I wanted denim. And no elastic. This is NOT like the older version or the men’s versions that don’t have elastic. I hate that all versions have elastic in the denim these days. I want my old versions back for women.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent sizing and material
customer_reviews.text: Levi's are my favorite jeans. I really love the 505's and the easily fit my ranch and gardening lifestyle! I have ordered at least 4 pairs of these in year and each pair has been different somehow. The pair I got 2 months ago where soft and lightweight. Perfect for summer! So I ordered another pair right away in hopes of getting the same ones again. Well they are similar material and I am sure I would like them but they are a full 2-3 inches longer then any other pair I have. They take multiple rolls to become wearable. Guess I need to just find d a local store that sells these so I can check out every pair......
customer_reviews.author: wildernessgal

customer_reviews.title: Not Official Leavi’s
customer_reviews.text: Not official Levi’s Jeans. I have a pair I bought at the Levi’s store and these are definitely knock offs. Poor job of sewing the Levi’s labels on the jeans. The fabric is much thinner and have more stretch, jegginga type material than real Lwvi’s. Disappointed that Amazonn let’s these sellers get away with calling them Levi’s.
customer_reviews.author: DR Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Great jeans!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for Levi's 505 jeans for a very long time and was thrilled to finally find them. Great jeans! Although Levi's has changed their heavier quality denim for a considerably thinner version, the fit is the same and I'll definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Shar G

customer_reviews.title: Just ordered a second pair
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Levis since the 1970's. I love them. They certainly aren't what they used to be, due to the fact that they are made outside of the USA, but that's not what this review is about. For the Levis that I am able to buy these days, these were perfect. Fit, looks, price. I am totally pleased. I used to really hate the stretchiness that they added to the jeans, but have come to accept it. I don't expect these to last 100 years like the good old Levis of yesterday, but I'm not going to live for another 100 years anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Crooked leg seam
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like the cut, color, and fit of these jeans. The stretch is just right: They are stretchy enough to be comfy without being overly stretchy such that they get saggy. The color is nice and the stitching color blends with the fabric color which looks more classy to me than when it is in contrast. However, the leg on one side is sewn really crooked which bugs me. If it was actually sewn correctly I would give them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: A. Young

customer_reviews.title: Run REALLY Big
customer_reviews.text: I am 5' 8.5" with a 33" inseam, 140 pounds. I'm usually a 6L. Tried a pair of these on in a 6L at a store and they were too big so ordered 2 pair of size 4L in the two lighter washes. One pair was just a tad loose, very wearable, and comfy. The other was huge. I would have returned but took off all the tags when the first pair I tried on fit well enough. Both were long enough. They are roomy throughout the thigh. A nice change from jeggings and other straight cut for those days your don't want to feel mushed. A nice weight of denim for cooler weather. Definitely order a size down.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica OMalley

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, true to size chart, flattering, POCKETS
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are great, I ended up ordering 3 in different colors because I liked them that much. Though I will say, they shrunk a little in length but not too much. It's only noticeable if im sitting and didn't pull the leg back down. I'm 5'5 125-130lbs and ordered a 4s. I did try the regular but they went under my heel. So mow I just have to deal with a slight annoyance when sitting. Other than that, they fit amazing. They're not tight, they sculpt my body perfect, they even soft enough that I don't mind staying in them after work. Definitely recommend trying them out!
customer_reviews.author: JennBerry

customer_reviews.title: slimming fit!
customer_reviews.text: The overall fit was comfortable and slimming. There wasn't any exposure from the back waist. I am only 5'2" and the leg length was very long without 4 inch heels. I would recommend them to you.
customer_reviews.author: Diva Mo

customer_reviews.title: Always a Classic
customer_reviews.text: Love my straight leg Levi's.....however the regulars should have fit perfectly in the length, and these are about 1.5 - 2 inches too long. Still keeping them, but have to watch what shoes I wear with them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why so stretchy?  Jeans or sweatpants?
customer_reviews.text: Although I purchased the exact same size and style of Levi's that I already own, these have a very different fit! They are a bit larger, but the biggest issue is that they are super duper stretchy. I look like I've got a load in my shorts by around 10am, by noon the crotch sags, and by the time I get off work I can barely stand wearing them because I've been pulling up my pants all day long. The waist has so much stretch to it that they are more like sweatpants than jeans. And due to the bagginess as the day wears on, they are far from flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Smee48

customer_reviews.title: Used sizing chart
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when ordering. I'm am 5ft 9in so I bought a long, but they were over 6 in too long. Other than that they fit really nice and is happy. Reordered another pair in medium length. Hope this helps the next customer.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Hingston

customer_reviews.title: Great jeans for the rest of us
customer_reviews.text: I can always count on Levi's for great fitting jeans. These straight legs are not too loose and definitely not skinny. Not everyone wants to wear skin tight jeans! So, thank goodness Levi's still gives us options. Also, they are nice and roomy in the hip and thigh area. Great jeans, great color, love it. These are my go-to jeans for the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: Levi changed these
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn straight leg 505 jeans in the same size for at least 15 years. I wear them every day, so I put a new one in the rotation every couple of years and toss an old one. But this new pair is over 2” longer in the inseam and the leg openings are 2” wider. Way too long to ever shrink enough and definitely not a straight leg to me. Will send them back. So disappointed to lose my old reliables.
customer_reviews.author: Why

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5' 6", 145 pounds, 62 years old. I bought these in the desert daze color in 29 x32 size. The fit is good but a little long with flats. They did bag slightly after a few wearings but nothing extreme. The fabric content varies with the color so that will make a difference in how they fit and wear. All in all a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara K. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: Where to start! I ordered a pair of 505 straight's based on the jeans I am currently wearing and they are a completely different quality and fit! To begin, the short I ordered drags on the ground. The fabric is thick, the crotch folds over and feels like it's made for a man, there is NO room for any kind of behind, and the smell coming out of the box! I will be returning these and hoping that what's available in-store is better. If not, it looks like I'll be looking for a new brand. It is so incredibly disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McKeon

customer_reviews.title: Horribly huge
customer_reviews.text: These pants fit decent at the waist but still big and the butt,hips, and thighs look and are huge. Looks like I took an air hose and put it in my pants. Maybe it’s just this pair I got but they are horrible on the size. I’m not a big girl either. I hope whoever orders these pants has better luck than I did. I got a size 12 and I do believe these would fit a 16.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Addicted

customer_reviews.title: No big pockets, thin material
customer_reviews.text: The reason I get men's jeans is because the pockets are nice and big and the material robust and long-lasting. As I like Levi's men jeans I thought their women's jeans would be the same; unfortunately, Levi's women's jeans follows the trend of many other brands of women's jeans. The material is soft (wears through very quickly) and the pockets are basically for pocket change--you'll not fit your wallet, your cell phone, or your sunglasses case in these. That said, still comfortable, and the flexible material means I can fit a 30 waist when normally I'm at a 32 or 34 in men's jeans. So if you don't care about big pockets or durable material, these will service just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Buy smaller than your normal size
customer_reviews.text: Levi's runs big, I typically wear a 4 but had to get a 2 because there is a lot of stretch in their jeans, some colors way more stretchy than others. Check material content when you buy, the blend is different for each color.
customer_reviews.author: Mr and Mrs Sylvan

customer_reviews.title: Flattering with some issues
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are true to size and flattering, but there are two problems. They are 30" inseam and standard short jeans are 29" inseam. This means that if short jeans are a perfect length for you, then you will have to roll these up. The second issue is that they are flare. Definitely not a straight cut as advertised. Other than that, they are good jeans and I will wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly F.

customer_reviews.title: Not for hourglass figures
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. I’m a size 10 to 12 in most jeans and have a small waist but wider hips (hourglass shape). It’s usually difficult for me to find a cut that flatters my figure anyway, but these were particularly bad. During wear, the back part of the waist band slides down and pulls on the front of the waist, so it digs in when I’m sitting down, even though I accidentally bought a size larger than I needed. When standing, the fit is ok on the hips, but a baggy in the legs. They just seem very poorly cut for a figure like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible design. I’ve never had a pair of Levi’s fail so badly as this pair. High-waters...to begin with, and the leg...not straight like advertised...but rather a high watered FLARE jean. Ugly ugly ugly! Ugh, what a stupid pair of jeans. Comes complete with sexist tiny front pockets that would only fit a nickel, let alone a hand. Skip these jeans...I wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: Holy Satan

customer_reviews.title: Stretches out easily-need a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: These do run large, but the denim quality I received felt comparable to what most jeans are now. I can't seem to find any that are as heavy weight as the old Levi's were, but these are still nice. I plan to order another pair a size smaller than I would normally order, because these now feel too loose after wearing them for a while (probably due to the extra stretchiness). I'm glad I ordered the short, though. I'm 5'4" & many times the short is too short & the long is too long, but that was not the case with these. The short was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I love these jeans, but they smell is AWFUL!
customer_reviews.text: These jeans fit awesome and I love them! The only downside is the smell! I have washed them 4 times and they still have a weird smell. I bought them in a different color at Kohl's and those have no smell. Not sure what the deal is. I don't typically use dryer sheets, but tried with these. They just ended up smelling like chemical and dryer sheet. I sure hope this dissipates with time. I'm almost embarrassed wearing them. Hopefully my nose is more sensitive and no one else can smell them. Other than the stench - I love these jeans! If it weren't for that one issue, these would get top marks from me.
customer_reviews.author: R. O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: dependable jeans for daily comfortable wear
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm getting old (wink) but i recall the days when jeans were not all skin tight and leggings. couldn't find any worthy jeans in the stores, had some great old school 505s from like a decade ago i was hanging onto, so gave it a shot that it was still as dependable. they are a bit different than a decade ago, for the same name and size, its a bit thinner stretchier material, but the fit is similar and I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Only jeans I will buy without trying on first
customer_reviews.text: I have never had luck buying jeans. If I found a pair I liked I would have to try on multiple copies of the same style and size because each pair always seemed to fit differently! I have finally found jeans that I can buy online without fear that they won't fit right. Each pair is the same as the others. They have just the right amount of "thickness" to them that they don't feel like they will fall apart after a few washings, but still feel very soft and comfortable. They will relax a little as you wear them through the day so keep that in mind when deciding on a size. Love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: Lori J Vargo

customer_reviews.title: Too big! Too stretchy!! I want some ...
customer_reviews.text: Too big! Too stretchy!! I want some cotton jeans with normal sized legs, so that they will STAY UP!! Does anybody know of any? Everyone is constantly tugging their pants up!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa I. Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: The was not set and continuously runs.
customer_reviews.text: The jeans are the right size and fit OK. The problem is that the dye runs and makes everything it contacts turn blue. The jeans have been washed several times and the dye is still an issue. The pants turn one’s legs blue which would not be a problem on Pandora but is annoying on Earth. These are not the Levi’s quality that one expects and Amazon Services should be aware of the inferior grade jeans they are selling.
customer_reviews.author: Landseer3

customer_reviews.title: I like wearing my jeans for about a week before washing ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for just "normal" jeans that aren't "mom jeans" and aren't skinny jeans. These are OK, but I wish they weren't so stretchy. I like wearing my jeans for about a week before washing them, and these only fit me when they just come out of the dryer. I am able to make do, but wish they weren't so stretchy. They are particularly baggy around the front pockets. I wear a 4-6 in most brands, and ordered a 4 in these, which is the smallest size offered on amazon. I can't try a size smaller, but would suggest sizing down if you are able to.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Nice but fit varies with color/fabric choice
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Mid rise. Perfect amount of stretch to keep shape and allow for easy movement. Short length ideal for those of us who are inthe 5’3 to 5’5 range. Island Rinse color is super dark blue and works well to dress up a look while still feeling comfy. Edit review after 2nd pair in Black Onyx. Beware that this fabric is very different from the 2 different denim ones I own. The fit is quite a bit more snug so I would consider ordering your usual and the next size up to compare and be sure you get what you want comfort wise out of the Black Onyx version.
customer_reviews.author: TNH

customer_reviews.title: This pair was horrible
customer_reviews.text: I got a 14S and the red Levi tag was missing the name. The were a stiff fit, not stretchy or thin. They were so long too and the straight leg was huge. It’s like this pair was an outlet pair or a defective pair. I am returning them ASAP. I don’t think they are fake but this pair has defects. I purchased another pair that I love in a different wash.
customer_reviews.author: TamBerine:

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’11” 210ibs. These are perfect and the fit is great. The material is good the color is great as well. I will be purchasing another pair. I got a 14 due to gaining weight. If u want snug then get a size below ur size. I am an in between 12-14 depending on material n brand
customer_reviews.author: rashida williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but definitely for curvy women.
customer_reviews.text: Fits quite large in the waist, hips, and thighs for a 26 x 32 ( size 2 ?) even though the 505’s are supposed to be ‘relaxed’. These are relaxed to the point of being too big from the mid thigh up. They also didn’t contain as much a percentage of cotton as stated under the color online. I’m going back to the 712 straight leg or boot cut from now on- much better for a smaller bottom body.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ross

customer_reviews.title: Runs large,  and not for petite women.
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT get these if you're petite. Pant legs were very long. Also, you may want to order a size down. The pants run large, but on top of that they also have quite a bit of stretch. I'm 5'2", usually anywhere between 114 and 120 lbs, ordered the 26. I always get 26 which typically fits great. These were huge!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not the Levis 505 I've always loved
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 2. I'm 5'4" and weigh 120 lbs. These pants are HUGE and very stretchy, more like a size 6. I'm so disappointed that my favorite 505's are no longer made the way they used to be. I'm going to have to scour the thrift stores to see if someone got rid of their good old-fashioned Levis. If you're looking for pants that run big and are stretchy, you'll love these. For me, they suck. A total waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: H.A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blend of fabric
customer_reviews.text: These are not the super lightweight fabric like many jeans nowadays, nor are they the super stretch. They are durable, hardworking jeans with a little give in them. I have them in Ambience and Sleek Blue, and they both fit perfectly. I love them! Especially because they have a lower rise than most, but the back isn't too low rise. On 33x30, the rise is 10.75 inches. I am 5'4 and the 33x30 are a perfect length for me. I am going back for another pair!
customer_reviews.author: puppitypup

customer_reviews.title: Light and stretchy
customer_reviews.text: I am looking for good quality, 100% (or close to) cotton jeans. These are not. I liked the color, but the fit of these was awful for me - the fabric bagged around the hips which was not flattering. The jeans felt light weight and are stretchy .... I am not a fan of too much stretch, especially in jeans. It's hard enough trying to find a decent fit and color without adding the challenges covid has created. My search continues ....
customer_reviews.author: Kiwipine

customer_reviews.title: 2 jeans, different look
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of the same jeans in 1 order and was surprised to find 2 jeans that looked totally different, even though they had exactly the same number, size and length (2x 505 womens straight leg jean, black onix, 33/16). One was pitch black and the other a lighter shade of black. The first one was considerably longer and looser than the second, as if it had been worn, but you could tell it was brand new. The tags showed they were made in different countries, which explains a lot. I do wear them both, so im not unhappy, but i would be hesitant to order again online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wife had liked these Levis so much when she purchased them previously ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife had liked these Levis so much when she purchased them previously that she watched for more to become available. She says they're the only jeans that fit her. These Levis don't lose their shape as they are worn throughout the day, quite so much as other brands and some Levis do. She'd caution others to follow the washing instructions: inside out, and cold water, to avoid color loss to the seams. She also ordered two other colors in the 505s.
customer_reviews.author: Allen D.

customer_reviews.title: Styled like 505s, but too much Lycra for me
customer_reviews.text: They’re great jeans, but why do all women’s jeans have to have so much spandex that they fit more like Leggings than jeans? My husband’s 505’s are awesome-twice as heavy and not a thread of Lycra! The waist is large, too. (I wear a size 10).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ratcliffe

customer_reviews.title: 80’s style roomy jeans
customer_reviews.text: This is a very roomy Mom jean from the 80’s. Having been a teenager back then I can assure you these are an 80’s fit! Was a little hard getting used to the very wide leg opening as it can’t really be rolled up without looking bulky. But I think with a heeled boot these will be awesome in cooler weather. I like the heavyweight denim too - for certain occasions and weather.
customer_reviews.author: L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Used to LOVE Levis. Not anymore!
customer_reviews.text: Changing my rating to 1 star. I’m tired of having to buy clothes that just disintegrate, even when you try to minimize washing them to 2-3x/month. I’m a lifetime Levi’s customer, and I’m truly sad to have to be ditching them for something else. Sure, it’s embarrassing to have to say it, but the thighs wear out in less than a year. I’ve even tried patching them, but those just fall off too. I guess I’ll have to go back to wearing men’s jeans from the competitor. :(
customer_reviews.author: The Rolling Rook

customer_reviews.title: 5'2" 120 lbs -- size 4  (27short)  dark color too big; light color fit is great!
customer_reviews.text: great pants, but the sizing for this color (dark blue) was too large. they fit a bit too loosely and a little too long. I've washed them twice and hot dryer setting, but they are just too big. I have an older pair of the same size that still fit perfectly -- but they are a light color. I also ordered the lighter color blue and those fit as expected. It's this color that seems 'off'. But good quality and well made otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: MsP

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit jeans
customer_reviews.text: These jeans don’t fit at all! I wear a size six in everything. But these were way too large! I couldn’t get to the return because I live in a small town and the pandemic has shut us down so now I have a new pair of jeans I cannot wear! Sad...
customer_reviews.author: P Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: You know the Levi’s commercial where all shapes and sizes are dancing and the pants look like they are molded to the person’s body? The did not include actors with big bums. While the material and fit is extremely flattering and comfortable, the bum area needs a little adjustment. I wear a size 18 and it fits a size 18. If I didn’t have a bum, I could have probably went to a size 16. I luv Levi’s material.
customer_reviews.author: D Mackin

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'0 and it is very tough finding pants, shirts, well, anything that fits without hemming or altering. These pants fit great. They are soft, but did come with a mothball type smell, not overpowering, but it was there. two washes and it worked. I do have to roll up the pants just once, but that is fine because over time, the pans will shrink to fit. haha. love them. I bought 2 more pair.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Happy turn-out
customer_reviews.text: I have always, ALWAYS, been skeptical of ordering clothes online because I am not built proportionally. I am 5'3" and roughly 155lbs. Short legged and long torso. BUT these jeans are great. A little long in the leg for me but nothing a pair of tennis shoes can't fix. I wear a 9 typically and I got the 30 regular (I probably could've gotten the short and the length would have been better but oh well). The denim is soft and has a little stretch to it but not so much that they fall off. Overall, for the price and convince of shopping online, I would recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kassady321

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing - seriously small - like 2 sizes
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in these jeans - I will not order anything but blue denim jeans in the future. For some reason - the company can't seem to get the same stretch into the black material. Oh well...just not a good thing. I had already taken out of package - washed like I normally do. But I should have tried them on first. So, they went to Good Will without ever being worn.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair - still happy
customer_reviews.text: I love these jeans. In an age of skinny jeans, I love having a relaxed fit that feels and looks good. They are a little long on me - I'm 5'4" - but they work if I wear a boot with a bit of a heel. If necessary, I can also give them a quick double roll up for tennis shoes. But they look better with the boots.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Waalkes

customer_reviews.title: Levi's are the most sensible choice
customer_reviews.text: When I was in art school I was a fit model for Levi's. I wore a size 8. I loved them back then very much. Today, I wear a size 4 and I love them still. I would never wear anything else but my Levi's. They're the best and oldest out in the west!
customer_reviews.author: Gwillakurz

customer_reviews.title: Room in the thighs without being baggy
customer_reviews.text: These are my new favorite jeans, I’m buying two more pairs! They are roomy in the butt and thigh, but not baggy. I’m only 5’6” but I have long legs for my height so i buy the long inseam, they are 34” and it’s perfect. I bought my normal size and it was perfect. Thicker than other brands but soft like they are already broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Deej

customer_reviews.title: So stretchy
customer_reviews.text: These are not thick, at all, but they aren't exactly cheap feeling either. There is a TON of stretch in them, SO MUCH STRETCH. I should've gone down at least one size because they're a little too loose. Usually I have to buy up a size to make sure my butt and quads fit (so I did) but I really doubt with the stretch in these that would've ever been a problem. If you're like me and have issues getting jeans to fit over the previously mentioned areas, but aren't huge in the waist, these would probably be a good option for you. Just be sure to buy your regular waist size.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Best Jeans EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this style and color! I usually wear a size smaller and have my closet full of the size smaller. I was given some medication by my neurologist that caused so much swelling that I bought a larger pair to be more comfortable. I can still get into the others but this size is more comfortable for now. I love this color and I also love the black! I don't know what I'll do if they ever stop making these. These are my only jeans!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: HappyHannah

customer_reviews.title: Too Stretchy, Fall Down
customer_reviews.text: I have bought other pairs of this style and size Levi’s but these did not fit the same. This fabric is too stretchy and causes this pair to fall down every time I lean over. The last pair I bought was perfect and had very little stretch. Also this fabric is too soft for my taste and just doesn’t feel like a normal Levi fabric. I loved my other Levis and am very disappointed in these.
customer_reviews.author: E. McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Fit is great, but they stink, as in odor.
customer_reviews.text: They fit as expected, but they stink. As in odor. The smells goes away after washing several times... but for a while they smell like latex or mothballs. I have purchased the same jeans in stores and they have ranged from a slight smell to no smell, but they must sit out long enough to off-gas, or something like that. Straight from Amazon though, they smell.
customer_reviews.author: luvtoread

customer_reviews.title: Love these tall/long Levi jeans!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fit of these jeans. (Because I am tall and fairly thin, I have a hard time finding pants/jeans.) I almost returned these because of the horrible chemical which was still very noticeable after the first washing. However, after several washings the smell has disappeared. (YAY!) These fit me in all the right places except for a gap of about 2 inches around the waist. Not a big deal since I sew. ;-) I plan on ordering another pair and size down just to see if that would take care of the gap.
customer_reviews.author: Rich & Lena H.

customer_reviews.title: Love these jeans
customer_reviews.text: Love these jeans, though they are a bit too large. I am 5'4" and about 123 lbs bought the 28/6 and they are just a bit too big at the waist. That said, they are incredibly comfortable. Some people commented that they disliked the stretch, I love the stretch. One problem with jeans is that they can sometimes be constricting. The slight stretch removes that. You can curl up in those pants, fly, etc. Fantastic casual jeans.
customer_reviews.author: MTCt

customer_reviews.title: Long size is NOT 34”!  Immersion color already faded looking. Lesser quality.
customer_reviews.text: I need 34” length. Noticed how thin material was and did not like how washed the Immersion color was. Then tried on the second pair(black) I ordered and noticed they seemed short so I got out tape measure. Neither pair was 34” long. The Immersion pair was not even 33” long. Very disappointed and feel as if I have been DUPED. Cannot recommend buying Levi’s without seeing and trying on.
customer_reviews.author: Nic's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Run Large
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5”6 139 lbs. I bought a 27 L & they were still a bit large & a tad too big. Length was great, I like my jeans long. I wish they were a better fit in the butt. I’ll keep them & truth be told I still like them a lot. I’d buy a 26 L if they were available, which seems crazy to get jeans that small but still
customer_reviews.author: Dayofhearts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hard to fit women!
customer_reviews.text: At 5'10, 135lbs, and 35" inseam, it's tough to find jeans to fit, so when these arrived and fit perfectly, I was so happy! Ordered 8/29 longs. All women's pants should be ordered like Levis with meaningful and consistent measurements, not by inconsistent arbitrary numbers 0-18 and up. There really should be a women's clothes revolution, cause from dry cleaning to blouses to accessories, women have to pay more for less (except for in the case of the women's 505s which are awesome)!
customer_reviews.author: JILL A FLANAGIN

customer_reviews.title: favorite pants ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the pants I've been looking for! Just enough stretch to be comfortable but not so much that they are loose at the end of he day like most womens pants. The flatten my belly without pinching or restricting my movement. Almost as comfy as yoga pants without any of the sloppiness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for a thin guy
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 12 or 32 waist 34 inseam in men’s. I got a size 10 long and they fit great. But could be tighter in waist since they do stretch a bit after wearing. I think order smaller size in these. Great fit otherwise
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Each wash fits differently
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pair, one in a darker wash that fits great, the other in the light wash which is baggy, too long and bulgy in the front with way too much fabric. They were the same style (supposedly) and same size. What gives? I keep trying to wear the light ones because I waited too long to return them and I end up super angry by the end of the day. I'm betting these will end up in the Goodwill pile shortly.
customer_reviews.author: CSE

customer_reviews.title: Not right
customer_reviews.text: This is for the Black Onyx 505 straight They have a weird smell almost like burnt rubber, they are thin and way tighter than the blue ones I bought. Even the button was over way too far so it made the waist even tighter. Not even sure if these are true Levi's they seem like a knock off, way different than the previous pairs I have bought
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly  Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great white pants
customer_reviews.text: I got a white pair from stitch fix and have to say they were not flattering at all so I went on a search to see if I could find a looser fitting non skinny jean and found this classic on amazon. These jeans are a little lighter feeling than some Levi’s I’ve had but in general they are just right they keep their shape and don’t sag down by end of the day. Will try to write another review after I wash them
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: More like flare-bottoms
customer_reviews.text: 33 reg = US 16, in case you're still confused like i was. The color is nice and the fit is great everywhere except the bottoms. They almost feel like bell-bottoms and are too long for my average inseam of 32". They kept getting caught between my heels and sandals. I'm not sure why they have to be 1 1/2" wider than my size 14s... my butt got bigger, not my ankles! I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine E. Miannay

customer_reviews.title: Don't fit like older Levi's
customer_reviews.text: The brand seems to have gotten away from the plain old style denim jeans and as a result the fit is not as good. I have purchased the same size for years, and this style/fit is not nearly as good. They are somewhat big around waist and hips, but the next size down will probably be too tight. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Shu

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed in the quality of these Jean's. I am a huge Levi's fan, I have been wearing them for years and I have owned dozens of pairs. Levi's is my go to brand because they're good quality, long lasting jeans. These are something else. Either these are not real Levi's, or the quality has taken a turn and they dont make them like the used to.. cheap, thin material, doesnt stretch at all, very uncomfortable. I ordered 3 pair and returned each one.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Less like denim but more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Because I already knew these run large now, I ordered a smaller size and it fits as expected. As I found in some of their other jeans, Levis has gone to vanity sizing. Just order a size smaller than you normally wear. This color (Legacy) is soft and has a lot of stretch without becoming baggy at the end of the day. These are 68% cotton, 23% polyester, 8% viscose and 1% elastane. Feels less like denim than the old jeans but much more comfortable to sit in all day. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: comav

customer_reviews.title: Dont reorder if you're not going to get the exact same thing.
customer_reviews.text: The first pair excellent fit. . The other 2 I ordered after were different. I ordered the same levi but the fabric was different, the rise was below the belly button like hip hugger/ low fit very uncomfortable, length was too long. No point in reordering when I ordered the exact same pair and got something else.
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are just okay enough that I won't return them but they are a big disappointment. The quality is nowhere near what I've come to expect from Levi's. I have other jeans from their 500-series and I know that different styles have different fabric content, but this material doesn't even feel like denim. It is very light weight. And the legs are baggier than I would expect from a straight leg style.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Burns

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I've never ordered Jeans online before. Its just one of those things that I prefer to try on at the store. But as stores are still pretty much closed, I used the label on my favorite pair to order the same size but in a different color. Definitely will do this again! Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Sadowski

customer_reviews.title: Long is not long
customer_reviews.text: This item very specifically states in the bulleted information that the length of the inseam for a long pair of jeans is 34 inches. Mine are long yet they are only 32 inches. This is NOT a long length. Do not purchase this item as the marketing information is incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Fits different from last pair
customer_reviews.text: I wear nothing but Levi jeans. I bought a pair of these exact jeans, same size and style, last year. So I bought another pair this year.....however these run smaller. I can wear them, but they are not as comfortable as the other pair. Needless to say I am disappointed and this isn’t the first time this has happened, it’s also happened with other styles. Please keep the jeans the same size year to year. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Bad chemical odor. Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair of the "sleek blue" in-store, and I liked the fit. The store had no more in that size, so I bought another pair from amazon. What I didn't notice in store is that this particular color has a HORRIBLE ODOR that you cannot wash out (I've washed 3 times so far). I just can't shake the smell, and I'm worried that it's noticeable to others and that they might think I don't wash myself. Of course, I can't return the jeans since I've washed them. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Molly North

customer_reviews.title: I feel like this is a fake item!
customer_reviews.text: This item was too short. I have bought the same levis 505 in size 4 in the past. I bought a size 2 now since I lost weight. But this new one is short. I put both my old (size 4) and this new size 2 together and it is shorter. I will actually measure the item before I return it and update this review. I can't believe that a company as big as Levi's is skimping on the length now and so I believe this is a fake!
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: These have an awful stench!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my package and they looked great and fit great....but what is the smell??? They smelled like an industrial petroleum chemical. Took them off and washed them. They still stunk. Washed them two more times and the awful smell was still there. Sent them back, will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine, but is not what I ordered. I ordered a light blue, called Ambiance, but received an onyx black. I plan to keep the black, but wanted a stretchy denim for working in the barn and riding. I can wear the black out, but it is not suited to the purpose for which I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Mad for Music

customer_reviews.title: Love Levi 505 straight
customer_reviews.text: These pants are long enough for my very long legs and fit exceptionally well! Will order again!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fabric
customer_reviews.text: What happened to the Levi jeans that were the original American classic denim? That fabric would last a lifetime. This “denim” is tissue paper thin. No matter how well it fits, the waistband is so lax it scrunches up. The seams on the outside of the hips are puckered because the fabric is so thin. Very disappointed in Levi. The quality has turned to junk. At least they were cheap. Guess you do get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Zzzelda

customer_reviews.title: Fit Well
customer_reviews.text: The jeans are much fuller in the ankle than the picture of the model. I am keeping these as they fit well, not like my favorite 525s but well enough to keep. The fabric is medium weighted. I’ve washed them twice at this point and they still have an odd smell in the fabric, just FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!! Incorrect sizing!
customer_reviews.text: How is it that I buy two exact same jeans, one blue and one black, but the black ones fit a size or two smaller in the waist than the blue ones? I have never ever had this happen with Levi's 505 jeans. I believe the black ones are either fake or have zero quality control. I shouldn't have washed them, I should have returned them. I'm now stuck with a pair of black jeans that will never fit me.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, don't last.
customer_reviews.text: Material is very cheap and thin. I've had these jeans a few months and they are already wearing out. Holes are forming around the crotch and rear. This is disappointing because older models of these jeans were great, and were the only jeans that I could find that fit me. But I can't be spending $45 on jeans that last less than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Think maybe sent 501 instead 505 though label says 505. Or maybe women instead misses size? Hope styles haven’t changed this much. I didn’t return because removed tags & laundered before wearing. Size usually fits fine, these almost flare at bottom, waist too big, stretch more as wear. Will donate, maybe buy where can return locally if don’t fit so don’t get same again.
customer_reviews.author: bzshopper

customer_reviews.title: They literally stink
customer_reviews.text: These are okay jeans. The biggest problem is the mothball/moldy stench. I've washed these three times and they still stink. Not sure if it's the elastane or the dye, but I've never bought a pair of Levi's that smelled like this. Hopefully putting them in the fresh air will help. The fit is okay. I just wish they would make real normal jeans with a waist that's not the same size as the hips and the pockets are normal. The pockets on these are better than some jeans that are out now. Really wish they would bring back the 512 Classic Slim Tapered. Really loved those.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Even thought mine fit nicely they did not fit like my Other 505’s
customer_reviews.text: I agree with whom ever said they were knock offs. Even thought mine fit nicely they did not fit like my Other 505’s! They were much thinner fabric and were not straight leg. I did keep them and think they fit nicely, just not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: denise newcomer

customer_reviews.title: Cotton content solved my problems
customer_reviews.text: After buying the same pair of Levi’s with a different fiber content that had cotton, polyester and spandex, I tried this pair since it was a higher cotton content & figured they wouldn’t stretch as much. I was correct with this assumption. These fit well and move with me but don’t stretch out and become annoying like my others. Will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Levi brand but not usual quality
customer_reviews.text: I am a Levi girl and always will be BUT this pair I don’t believe has much denim. I can compare this pair to others I own and different quality. The fit was not the best either. Loose in the waist. I am finding that on any “denim” jean so maybe it’s an industry flaw.
customer_reviews.author: review

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: They are slightly longer than I expected (tip: read the inseam measurements!) but that's more of a public service announcement than an issue. The color is exactly like the photo, the fit is great. Some people were debating if these were knock-offs. They are legitimate. The tags in the photos posted are an alternative logo and match another pair I have.
customer_reviews.author: Michele T

customer_reviews.title: Very baggy in the seat and legs
customer_reviews.text: They fit like wide leg pants, only coming in at the waist. I don't remember 505's fitting this way. They were also <33" in length rather than 34" (I didn't measure, just went by where the hem hit me).
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Good but inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: My experience was a little different from some of the other reviewers. I bought these in 3 different colors all size 6L, 1 from Kohl's and 2 on Amazon (directly from Amazon not a third party seller). The other two pairs fit perfectly and were the same fabric, other than the color. They had a slight stretch to them, just enough to make them very comfortable. This pair was stiffer and less stretchy, and thus a tad tight and less comfortable. They are still ok to wear and may stretch out after wearing a bit. It seems there is a lot of inconsistency in Levi's lately which is somewhat disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: iamlor

customer_reviews.title: Too stretchy
customer_reviews.text: Too much stretch, I would like to return them but I guess I waited too long.
customer_reviews.author: S. McKee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these jeans. I have muscular legs and a lot of skinnier jeans are too tight for me. These have a tiny bit of stretch, which makes a world of difference. They wash well and hang dry with no shrinkage. I have several pair. Also... In my opinion, they run slightly large because of the stretch.
customer_reviews.author: E. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Love this style
customer_reviews.text: Love these jeans. If you have a little waist and big hips and thighs you should try these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this one size larger for those "days" and it fit perfectly. I also ordered 2 pair of 2 sizes smaller and they also fit perfect in length and size.
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: Stretched out too much after wearing a few hours
customer_reviews.text: The pants fit pretty well when I first put them on. But after only a few hours they stretched out in the rear and hips. I tried washing and drying— same issue. Very cheap denim — not the Levi brand I trusted. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: DJGNYC

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I have always purchased this style and size of levis because I love the fit! I was very disappointed when these arrived, the size on the tag was a 10 but these jeans were more like a 4 or 6! The fabric was also extremely light, you wouldn't want to wear them in cold weather! They were clearly not the correct size, I even put them next to another pair (which were also new) and you could clearly see the difference. Very disappointed, sent them back
customer_reviews.author: K..B.

product_meta.title: Levi's Women's Straight 505 Jeans
product_meta.description: A true classic. The 505 straight offers an essential, versatile fit that works with just about anything. Pair them with flats or heels depending on your preference.
feature_bullets: Zip fly with button closure closure
Wash And Dry Inside Out With Like Colors; Liquid Detergent Is Recommended
Front Rise: 9 7/8"; Back Rise: 14"; Leg Opening: 16"
